prompts: Create a green, amorphous Pokemon that uses psychic powers to confuse opponents.
Show me a cute psychic-type Pokemon that floats and has a round body.
Imagine a small Pokemon that evolves from a jelly-like creature into something more powerful.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that thrives in grassy fields and has a playful personality.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a green blob and can manipulate psychic energy with ease.
Design a playful and curious Pokemon that lives in forests and loves to explore.
Give me a whimsical character that is a psychic-type and has a bubbly, cheerful demeanor.
